call.description: Executes a command string and returns the result.

exec.description: Executes a specific function reference with arguments.

wait.description: Wait for a specified number of milliseconds before executing a callback.

click.description: Simulates a click or double-click event on a DOM element.

parse.attribute.description: Parses a string into key-value pairs separated by ';' and ':'.

parse.text.description: Parses HTML string into a DOM node.

parse.json.description: Parses a JSON string safely, returning an object with value or error.

element.select.description: Selects an element by CSS selector. Returns single element or array.

element.find.description: Finds elements within a node using a selector.

element.getTagLink.description: Finds the closest anchor, button, or label ancestor of an element.

element.resolveCall.description: Resolves the call context of an element.

element.getPropertyByPath.description: Retrieves a nested property from an object using dot-separated path.

element.extractBracketValues.description: Extracts values inside brackets from a string.

element.runOnEvent.description: Runs the appropriate action(s) for a parsed element event.

element.onchange.description: Handles onchange event for an element, running associated actions.

element.onload.description: Executes onload actions for an element or NodeList.

log.info.description: Logs information to console if debugging is enabled.

log.error.description: Logs errors to console if debugging is enabled.

log.warn.description: Logs warnings to console if debugging is enabled.

config.get.description: Retrieves configuration settings from an element or standard object.

config.set.description: Applies configuration settings to the app object.
